name: nd-file
description: save, update and delete content to file or directory

1.0.0.message: a lot of breakchange; now support read,write,rename files with multiple thread

0.3.0.message: now we can cache file if file is already exist

0.2.0.message: add file move and retry when error occurred

0.1.1.message: fix folder-not-empty not throw when load by name

0.1.0.message: refactor all code and first release

0.1.0-rc.4.message: add new error event when folder not empty

0.1.0-rc.3.message: add custom callback when exception occurred
